Lokasi Hilangnya WN China di Pulau Sangiang Diduga Jadi Pertemuan Dua Arus
06 Nov 2019, 10:24 by M Iqbal
Serang - Tiga warga Negara (WN) China yang hilang di perairan Pulau Sangiang, Banten hingga saat ini belum ditemukan. Warga sekitar Pulau Sangiang menyebut lokasi hilangnya WN China tersebut merupakan pertemuan dua arus.
Tokoh masyarakat Pulau Sangiang, Sofian Sauri, menuturkan, lokasinya berada di sekitar Tanjung Bajo atau bagian utara Pulau Sangiang. Di sana, warga mengenal lokasi itu memiliki arus kuat karena menjadi tempat pertemuan dua arus dari Timur dan Selatan.
"Kalau Tanjung Bajo itu pertemuan arus timur dan selatan. Ya kalau tidak tau lokasi memang bahaya walaupun tidak ada ombak," kata Sofian kepada wartawan, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Lokasi itu memang tidak diperuntukkan sebagai tempat menyelam atau snorkeling lantaran karakteristik lokasinya yang memiliki arus kuat. Warga biasanya mengarahkan ke tempat lebih aman jika ada wisatawan yang hendak menikmati keindahan bawah laut.

Location of Chinese WN Loss on Sangiang Island Allegedly Becomes a Meeting of Two Currents
Nov 6, 2019, 10:24 by M Iqbal
Serang - Three Chinese citizens missing in the waters of Sangiang Island, Banten, so far have not been found. Residents around Sangiang Island said the location of the loss of Chinese citizens was a meeting of two currents.
Sangiang Island community figure, Sofian Sauri, said, its location is around Tanjung Bajo or the northern part of Sangiang Island. There, residents know the location has a strong current because it becomes a meeting place for two currents from East and South.
"If Tanjung Bajo is a meeting of the east and south currents. Yes, if you don't know the location, it is indeed dangerous even though there are no waves," Sofian told reporters on Wednesday (11/06/2019).
The location was not intended as a place to dive or snorkel because of the location characteristics that have strong currents. Residents usually steer to safer places if there are tourists who want to enjoy the beauty of the underwater.
